titles.title: Michigan Indian Land Claims Settlement Act Amendments
To extend the deadlines for distributing certain funds secured by the Michigan Indian Land Claims Settlement Act and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 2/16/2006--Introduced. Michigan Indian Land Claims Settlement Act Amendments - Amends the Michigan Indian Land Claims Settlement Act to extend to December 15, 2007, the deadline for approval of the judgment distribution roll of descendants of specified Indian bands and tribes.
